channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Horrendous Pot Hole, 4th November
item.description:
Absolutely huge, I drove over it and my car wheel has been damaged.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 abandoned litter bins obstructing pavement, 4th November
item.description:
3 abandoned litter bins obstructing pavement. Situated right near a tree. Makes it really difficult to get past (wheelchair and pram especially). Ive repeatedly complained about this. The bins used to be left there by no 20 vernham road . These bins are un-numbered. They attract fly tipping also.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vambery Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, 4th November
item.description:
Rubbish dumped and been there since Saturday night

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Street, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and tons of leaves on pavement and road, 4th November
item.description:
Pavement needs to be cleaned of leaves and litter all down Thorngate Road and into turning circle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Thorngate Road, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leak on footpath to erith station, 4th November
item.description:
The water leak down the path towards erith station has been happening for over a year. The water smells like it is contaminated or is sewage. With the leaves it is a slip hazard and people are having accidents as half the path is now permanently wet and leaves are mixed in. The weather is getting colder and once it starts the freeze over, this will be an even more serious hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stonewood Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling not collected at 98 Colthurst Crescent, 4th November
item.description:
Today the recycling wasn't collected from the bin shed at 98 Colthurst Crescent. This has been occurring more frequently. Would you be able to address this asap as the bin shed is full.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colthurst Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water / sewage leak and slip hazard on the hill, 4th November
item.description:
This water leak has been happening for over a year. The water smells like it is contaminated or is sewage. With the leaves it is a slip hazard and people are having accidents as half the path is now permanently wet and leaves are mixed in. The weather is getting colder and one it starts the freeze over, this will be a serious hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bexley Road, Northumberland Heath, London

This needs to be sorted pls

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): White Hart Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Pothole, 4th November
item.description:
The pothole is near this bus stop, it’s been there for months and months, every time a bus drives over it, everyone get chucked from side to side, it quite hurts your back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walworth Road, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting on during the day, 4th November
item.description:
Street light 04 on the unpaved path behind the Global Pond Nature Reserve and leading to Bacon's College has been on during the day for several months causing unnecessary energy use. Please investigate and fix.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waterman's Way, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting on during the day, 4th November
item.description:
Street light 580-03 on the paved path around Stave Hill, near the entrance to Stave Hill Ecology Park, has been on during the day for several months causing unnecessary energy use. Please investigate and fix.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dock Hill Avenue, Rotherhithe, London

item.title: Vegetation encroaching onto pavement, 4th November
item.description:
The vegetation on the corner with the public path into the woods has been encroaching across the pavement all summer. It wouldn’t be so bad but there is a lamp post on the pavement near the kerb so this make the pavement really quite narrow.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazelmere Road, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A dead fox, 4th November
item.description:
A dead fox
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Warner Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roadside vendors, Trip and fall hazard pallets on footpath, 4th November
item.description:
It’s very obvious that the sweet vendors are leaving their rubbish on the footpath after they close. This is unacceptable ,the footpath is not a dumping ground. I mean, no member of the public would purchase that many items and just leave the waste on the road or footpath. Clearly, it’s the street vendors who are doing this. How can someone leave a whole pallet in the middle of the footpath? Please do check the camera actually during the daytime there is a fruit windor near the corner of the street, but need to double chech he is doing it or not.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Rye Lane, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary ramps are unfit for purpose, 4th November
item.description:
Temporary ramps provided due to footpath closure next to construction site boundary are unfit for purpose and frankly an accident waiting to happen. They are unfixed and move when people walk on them. Present for at least weeks if not longer.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hobbs Place Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cover of lamp post electrical unit seems to have moved, 4th November
item.description:
There’s a slight gap with wires on view. Could you please also remove the out of date “no fouling” sign on the lamp post. There doesn’t seem to be a problem with dog fouling currently but stencils would be more appropriate along the road if there were an issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clinton Avenue, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves, weeds and litter on Cester Street, 4th November
item.description:
Cester Street E2 8NE has not been swept or cleaned in months and months. Dead leaves and weeds are affecting neighbouring properties and making the street look dirty. I have lived here for more than 20 years and have noticed a decline in cleanliness here.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whiston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa dumped outside house, 4th November
item.description:
Sofa dumped the night of 2.11.2025, was reported got told it was soled at 11.30 today, 4. 11.2025 but Sofa is still in same place
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nevill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
